alert.note: Alert for Beadle (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 6:23PM MDT until June 29 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Beadle County in east central South Dakota... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 722 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Burdette to near Vayland to 11 miles west of Wessington Springs, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Wessington around 730 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Wolsey, Virgil, Huron and Cavour. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
